section.title: labor rates creating new standard Standard Labor Rate
section.para: To create a new Standard Labor Rate, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new labor rate, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a unique code to identify the Standard Labor Rate.
Enter a description to further identify the Standard Labor Rate.
Amount entered represents dollars per man hour for the specified code.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a Standard Labor Rate, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Standard Labor Rate and adds it to the master list of Standard Labor Rates.
